overview:
Jeremy Geelan is a Writer, Director, Publisher, Speaker, Media Advisor & Company President.

Exponent of “helping the Web be all it can,” he has a special interest in social computing/social software and its impact on business, society, politics, economics, culture, education and entertainment.

Domain expert on “the future of the future,” with 30+ years of continuous media experience from BBC TV, BBC Radio, and national newspapers in the UK to worldwide book publishing then online publishing & software development in the US. Member since April 2007 of Guidepoint Global Advisors - an international network of executives, managers, consultants and other academic and industry professionals who provide consulting services to business decision-makers and leading investors from around the world.

He acts as an Advisor to Kaazing Corp.
